name: Dice Pong (Ultra Rush)
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Dice pong is a pong game playable against an AI or against a second player. The goal is to score 6 "points". However, be careful because the ball is a dice that takes a value of +1 (up to 6) each time a player touches it. 

The 6 points you can score are marked by a slot behind your paddle. 

There are power-ups to pick up to change the course of the game: 

Music and some effect are from Freesound in public or creative commons licences.
